name: Arctic Cave
description: Arctic caves are a pixel bright and hardcore platformer with 8 bit music design and more levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
